text: Tadera upare lanchana hana debe yekhane'i tara thakuka na kena, yadi na allah‌-theke-asa rasi dbara ba manusa-theke- pa'oya rasi, ara tara allah‌ra rosa arjana kareche, ara tadera upare durdasa hana debe. Ta'i hayeche -- kenana tara allah‌ra nirdesabali aman'ya kare calechila, ara nabiganake an'yayabhabe hatya karate yacchila. Ta'i haya, karana tara abadhya hayechila ara tara sima-langhana karechila.
